content.text:
# Karnataka State Film Award for Best Editor

| former name =
| award1_type = Total awarded
| award1_winner = 49
| award2_type = First winner
| award2_winner = V. P. Krishnan
| award3_type = Last winner
| award3_winner = Prateek Shetty
| website =
| previous =
| next =
}}
Karnataka State Film Award for Best Editor is a state film award of the Indian state of Karnataka  given during the annual Karnataka State Film Awards. The award honors Kannada language films.
Superlative winners
{| class="wikitable sortable"
| P. Bhakthavathsalam|| 6 Awards
|-
| Suresh Urs|| 5 Awards
|-
| Basavaraj Urs || 4 Awards
|-
||V. P. KrishnanR. JanardhanB. S. Kemparaju|| 3 Awards
|}
